name: CLARITY_NRG
description: This table holds the no add, single response items from the Geographic Area master file (NRG).

columns.name: INTERNAL_ID
columns.description: Unique ID of the geographical region

columns.name: AREA_NAME
columns.description: The name of the geograpic region

columns.name: AREA_DISPLAY_NAME
columns.description: The display name of the geographic region.
